name: StochasticDepth
description: Implements the Stochastic Depth from “Deep Networks with Stochastic Depth” used for randomly dropping residual branches of residual architectures.

properties._description:
p (float) – probability of the input to be zeroed.
mode (str) – "batch" or "row". "batch" randomly zeroes the entire input, "row" zeroes randomly selected rows from the batch.
